TopicTitle: Can't mod veichle after reverting to VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I built a craft and went to launch it, I found that the view was zoomed out to space and the game became unresponsive. I reverted to the VAB. After this some of the parts were missing, so I reloaded the craft save. I am now not able to use the VAB at all, the staging is acting as if I do not have anything attached to the root node and I am not able to select any parts either existing or new. Importing the craft file into a different save does not fix the issue.

I have no mods, and I am running Windows 7 x64. KSP Ver 1.0.4.861 

I have had issues with overlapping parts crashing the VAB before, this seems to be something different. 

Here is a screenshot of the issue as I am seeing it in the VAB. 

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=468667565](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=468667565)

Any help is greatly appreciated!
Hi Semicon, please upload your craft file to dropbox ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
